name: GravityFacts
0:
”Alexa open gravity facts”
”Alexa ask gravity facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell gravity facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gravity facts
des:
Ask for Gravity Facts, and learn about how strong is it.

Gravity Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Gravity Facts" or "Alexa, open Gravity Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
